name: 文档生成系统查询模板字典
description: Excel报表、Word文档、PDF报告、PPT演示文稿等文档生成相关功能的查询模板

文档生成统计.sql: SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY document_type
文档生成统计.description: 统计30天内各类型文档生成数量

Excel报表生成记录.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE document_type = 'excel' AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
Excel报表生成记录.description: 查询7天内Excel报表生成数量

Word文档生成记录.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE document_type = 'word' AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
Word文档生成记录.description: 查询7天内Word文档生成数量

PPT演示文稿生成记录.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE document_type = 'ppt' AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
PPT演示文稿生成记录.description: 查询7天内PPT演示文稿生成数量

PDF报告生成记录.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE document_type = 'pdf' AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
PDF报告生成记录.description: 查询7天内PDF报告生成数量

用户文档生成统计.sql: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
用户文档生成统计.description: 统计30天内用户文档生成数量排行
用户文档生成统计.response: 用户文档生成统计完成

文档生成成功率.sql: SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as success, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as success_rate FROM generated_documents WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY document_type
文档生成成功率.description: 统计7天内各类型文档生成成功率
文档生成成功率.response: 文档生成成功率统计完成

文档大小统计.sql: SELECT document_type, AVG(file_size) as avg_size, MAX(file_size) as max_size, MIN(file_size) as min_size FROM generated_documents WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND file_size > 0 GROUP BY document_type
文档大小统计.description: 统计30天内各类型文档大小分布

热门文档模板.sql: SELECT template_name, COUNT(*) as usage_count FROM generated_documents WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY template_name ORDER BY usage_count DESC LIMIT 10
热门文档模板.description: 统计30天内最受欢迎的文档模板
热门文档模板.response: 热门文档模板统计完成

文档生成错误统计.sql: SELECT error_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM generated_documents WHERE status = 'error' AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY error_type ORDER BY count DESC
文档生成错误统计.description: 统计7天内文档生成错误类型分布
文档生成错误统计.response: 文档生成错误统计完成

文档模板总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM document_templates WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

活跃文档模板.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM document_templates WHERE status = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL
活跃文档模板.description: 查询活跃文档模板数量

文档模板分类统计.sql: SELECT template_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM document_templates WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY template_type ORDER BY count DESC
文档模板分类统计.description: 统计文档模板类型分布
文档模板分类统计.response: 文档模板分类统计完成

文档下载统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM document_downloads WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
文档下载统计.description: 查询7天内文档下载次数

热门下载文档.sql: SELECT document_id, document_name, COUNT(*) as download_count FROM document_downloads WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY document_id, document_name ORDER BY download_count DESC LIMIT 10
热门下载文档.description: 统计30天内下载次数最多的文档
热门下载文档.response: 热门下载文档统计完成

用户下载行为.sql: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as download_count FROM document_downloads WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY download_count DESC LIMIT 10
用户下载行为.description: 统计30天内用户文档下载行为
用户下载行为.response: 用户下载行为统计完成
